project_abstract.cdata: The Sichuan Provincial Highway Project will assist the Government in meeting the road transport demand in the most important and congested corridor in Sichuan Province and in improving management of the provincial road network by introducing modern planning and management techniques, including training. Specifically the project comprises, the construction of a 340km high-standard highway between Chengdu and Chongqing and the reconstruction of 105km of key rural roads. The project will finance technical assistance for the introduction of improved road planning by starting preparation of a road data bank, and the introduction of paved road evaluation as a basis for a pavement strengthening program. The loan will provide for staff training in the various fields of the road subsector. Finally, the loan will finance assistance in highway related research and modernization of design, construction and materials specifications, and in civil works contract documentation.

P003524.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>四川成渝公路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将协助四川省政府满足其最重要且最拥堵交通干线沿线的公路运输需求，通过引入现代化规划和管理方法（包括培训方法）改善省级路网管理。项目的具体内容包括：（1）在成都和重庆之间建设一条340公里长高标准公路；（2）重建105公里主要农村公路；（3）提供技术援助，支持通过着手准备公路数据库引入良好公路规划方法，开展硬化公路评价，为路面加固工程奠定基础；（4）就公路行业各方面内容开展人员培训；（5）帮助开展公路相关研究，更新设计、施工和材料规范，编制土建工程合同文件。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
